Veteran American voice actor '''John Stephenson''' ([[9 August]] [[1923]] - [[15 May]] [[2015]]) played various parts in the [[Rankin/Bass]] productions.

==Filmography==
* [[1977]]: [[The Hobbit (1977 film)|''The Hobbit'' (1977 film)]]: [[Dori]], [[Great Goblin|The Great Goblin]], [[Bard]] 
* [[1980]]: [[The Return of the King (1980 film)|''The Return of the King'' (1980 film)]]: [[Witch-king|Witch-king of Angmar]], Gondorian Guard
